title: Banshee's Veil recipe
body:
Banshee's Veil need a new recipe, some like this:

Banshee's Veil recipe:

{{item:3801}}  Crystalline Bracer (600g) + {{item:3211}}  Spectre's Cowl (1200g) + 1000g =  **2800g** {{item:3102}} 

Stats	:

+450 health
+55 magic resistance
**+150% base health regeneration**
Passive	Unique: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.

Edit: {{item:3105}} : {{item:3801}} + {{item:1033}} + 800g

replies.body: I still want the health regen part of the Banshee's Veil passive. It is so good when I end up with more health after I got ignited.
Yeah the Crystalline Bracer fit perfectly to built the Banshee's idk why they don't put on the recipe yet.
Only problem is Crystalline gives 50% hp regen and spectre's gives 100% if you got hit. Losing hp regen for upgrading is bad.
Spectre don't give 100%, give 150% but if you are hitted by a spell, its only a ocassional regen.
Yeah I know, that is the reason that I increase the price and the health regen a little bit, 50% more health regen and 50g more, I really feel the Crystaline Bracer fits very well.
